001package gbw.melange.common;
002
003import org.apache.logging.log4j.Level;
004import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.Filter;
005import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.LoggerContext;
006import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.ConsoleAppender;
007import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.Configuration;
008import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.ConfigurationFactory;
009import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.ConfigurationSource;
010import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.Order;
011import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.builder.api.AppenderComponentBuilder;
012import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.builder.api.ConfigurationBuilder;
013import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.builder.api.ConfigurationBuilderFactory;
014import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.builder.impl.BuiltConfiguration;
015import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.plugins.Plugin;
016
017import java.net.URI;
018
019@Plugin(name = "CustomConfigurationFactory", category = ConfigurationFactory.CATEGORY)
020@Order(50)
021public class Log4jConfigFactory extends ConfigurationFactory {
022
023    static Configuration createConfiguration(final String name, ConfigurationBuilder<BuiltConfiguration> builder) {
024        builder.setConfigurationName(name);
025        builder.setStatusLevel(Level.ERROR);
026
027        builder.add(builder.newLogger("gbw.melange", Level.DEBUG)
028                .add(builder.newAppenderRef("Stdout"))
029                .addAttribute("additivity", false));
030
031        builder.add(builder.newLogger("org.apache", Level.WARN)
032                .addAttribute("additivity", false));
033
034        builder.add(builder.newLogger("org.reflections", Level.WARN)
035                .addAttribute("additivity", false));
036
037        builder.add(builder.newFilter("ThresholdFilter", Filter.Result.ACCEPT, Filter.Result.NEUTRAL).
038                addAttribute("level", Level.INFO));
039
040        AppenderComponentBuilder appenderBuilder = builder.newAppender("Stdout", "CONSOLE").
041                addAttribute("target", ConsoleAppender.Target.SYSTEM_OUT);
042
043        appenderBuilder.add(builder.newLayout("PatternLayout").
044                addAttribute("pattern", "%d{dd-MM HH:mm:ss.SSS} [%t] %highlight{%-5level} %c{-2} - %msg%n"));
045
046        appenderBuilder.add(builder.newFilter("MarkerFilter", Filter.Result.DENY,
047                Filter.Result.NEUTRAL).addAttribute("marker", "FLOW"));
048
049        builder.add(appenderBuilder);
050
051        builder.add(builder.newLogger("org.apache.logging.log4j", Level.DEBUG).
052                add(builder.newAppenderRef("Stdout")).
053                addAttribute("additivity", false));
054
055        builder.add(builder.newRootLogger(Level.ERROR).add(builder.newAppenderRef("Stdout")));
056        return builder.build();
057    }
058
059    @Override
060    public Configuration getConfiguration(final LoggerContext loggerContext, final ConfigurationSource source) {
061        return getConfiguration(loggerContext, source.toString(), null);
062    }
063
064    @Override
065    public Configuration getConfiguration(final LoggerContext loggerContext, final String name, final URI configLocation) {
066        ConfigurationBuilder<BuiltConfiguration> builder = ConfigurationBuilderFactory.newConfigurationBuilder();
067        return createConfiguration(name, builder);
068    }
069
070    @Override
071    protected String[] getSupportedTypes() {
072        return new String[] {"*"};
073    }
074}
